Translations.Text: jyare temane su'aiba a.Sa.E kahyum, ke sum tamane dara nathi
hum tamara mate nisthavana payagambara chum
allahathi daro ane marum ajnapalana karo
hum ana mate tamari pase kami valatara nathi icchato, marum valatara samagra srstina palanahara pase che
mapa-tola purepurum apo, ochum apanara na bano
lokone temani vastu ochi karine na apo. Nidarata sathe dharatimam vidroha karata na pharo
te allahano dara rakho, jene tamarum ane tamara purvajonum sarjana karyum
te loko'e kahyum, tame te loko manthi cho jemana para jadu kari devamam ave che
ane tum to amara jevo ja eka manavi che. Ane ame to tane jutha bolanara'o manthi samaji'e chi'e
jo tum saca loko manthi hoya to amara para akasana tukada phenki batava
kahyum ke maro palanahara khuba sari rite jane che je kami tame kari rahya cho
karanake te loko'e temane juthalavya to, temane chanyadana divasana prakope pakadi lidha, te bhare divasano prakope hato
ni:Sanka amam moti sikhamana che ane temana manthi vadhare padata loko musalamana na hatam
ane kharekhara tamaro palanahara te ja che, vijayi ane dayalu
